text:
View 1;
Seventh Avenue north east corner of 32nd Street, to west 33rd Street, showing Hotel Pennsylvania on right.

October 1929.

View 2;
Seventh Avenue north east showing Macy's Dept Store at 34th Street, west on right, and 7th Avenue car line before demolition.

P.L.Speer.
January 23, 1916.

View 1;
Seventh Avenue north east corner of 32nd Street, to west 33rd Street, showing Hotel Pennsylvania on right.

View 2;
Seventh Avenue north east showing Macy's Dept Store at 34th Street, west on right, and 7th Avenue car line before demolition.

P.L.Speer.
January 23, 1916.

General View Midtown Manhattan, Garment Center: Looking north-westward along Seventh Avenue from West 32nd Street, showing the numerous tall buildings where most of the nation's clothing is made. In the right background is the Baremount Building.

View 2 is toward the Hudson River from Broadway near 37th Street. On the left is the 41-story Garment Center Building; on the right the 30-story loft building at Seventh Avenue and 39th Street.

P. L. Sperr

View 1: April 2, 1928
View 2: August 18, 1929
title: General view - Midtown Manhattan - [Garment Center.]
